name: GAME NO KANDUME – SEGA GAMES CAN VOL.1
summary:
A compilation of Sega Meganet games, released exclusively in Japan for the Sega Mega-CD. Games included:

Flicky
Hyper Marbles
Paddle Fighter
Phantasy Star II: Amia's Adventure
Phantasy Star II: Eusis's Adventure
Phantasy Star II: Huey's Adventure
Phantasy Star II: Shilka's Adventure
Pyramid Magic
Pyramid Magic II
Pyramid Magic III
Pyramid Magic Special

videos.name: Gameplay video
videos.title: Game Kanzume Vol:1 (Sega Game Can Vol:1)
